Welcome to intake_xarray's documentation!
================================================

This package enables the set of data-loading methods from Xarray to be used within the Intake
data access and cataloging system.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   quickstart.rst
   api.rst
   contributing.rst
